verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "I shall now <S%H5595>perish<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> There is nothing <S%H2896>better<s%> for me than <S%H3588>that<s%> I <S%H4422>should<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> will <S%H2976>despair<s%> of <S%H1245>me,<s%> to seek me any more in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> So shall I <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> he and the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who were with <S%H397>him,<s%> to Achish the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4582>Maoch,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> with <S%H397>Achish<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> he and his <S%H582>men,<s%> every <S%H582>man<s%> with his <S%H1004>household,<s%> even <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H3159>Jezreelitess,<s%> and <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H3762>Carmelitess,<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>
It was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath:<s%> and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> no more again for <S%H3254>him.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> "If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> let them <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H7704>country,<s%> that I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5650>there.<s%> For why should your servant <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4467>royal<s%> city with <S%H5892>you?<s%>"
Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> why <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> pertains to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H4557>number<s%> of the days that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was a full <S%H3117>year<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> on the <S%H1651>Geshurites,<s%> and the <S%H1511>Girzites,<s%> and the <S%H6003>Amalekites;<s%> for <S%H2007>those<s%> were the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> who were of <S%H5769>old,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur,<s%> even to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and saved neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2421>alive,<s%> and took <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and the <S%H899>clothing;<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H397>Achish.<s%>

<S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Against <S%H408>whom<s%> have you made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of the <S%H3397>Jerahmeelites,<s%> and against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenites.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>saved<s%> neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2421>alive,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Lest they should <S%H5046>tell<s%> of <S%H559>us,<s%> saying, <S%H1732><s%> 'David <S%H6213>this,<s%> and this has been his <S%H4941>way<s%> all the <S%H3117>time<s%> he has <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>'"

<S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "He has made his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H887>utterly<s%> to <S%H887>abhor<s%> <S%H5650>him.<s%> Therefore he shall be my servant <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"
